    • Field Detail

      • different_sizes

        static int different_sizes
        The variable storing the option for situation when images are different sizes. 2 - Enlarge smaller one 3 - Shrink bigger one 4 - cut the bigger to the smaller one.

      • input

        static java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] input
        The array storing all images on which there will be performed merge operation.

      • list_of_images

        static java.util.HashMap<javax.swing.JButton,java.io.File> list_of_images
        Images as files which are values for JButtons.
